taskDescription: Implement proper workflow execution and monitoring system. Set up task distribution verification and agent progress tracking. Ensure frontend reporting through admin chat.
workflowContext: Fix workflow execution issues where tasks aren't being properly distributed and monitored. Ensure proper coordination between Elena and other agents.

workflowTemplate.name: Custom Workflow - elena
workflowTemplate.description: Fix workflow execution issues where tasks aren't being properly distributed and monitored. Ensure proper coordination between Elena and other agents.

agents.taskDescription: Implement proper workflow execution and monitoring system. Set up task distribution verification and agent progress tracking. Ensure frontend reporting through admin chat.

coordinationSteps: 1. Initialize workflow and assign tasks to agents
2. Monitor agent progress and task completion
5. Validate success criteria and compile results
successCriteria: All assigned agents respond and acknowledge their tasks
All expected deliverables are provided by agents
No blocking errors or failures in task execution
